title: (x) Looking for a font similar to the TopNotch logo - various suggestions {Yves, Mike Y, Rainer}
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for a similar font like the one use in Topnodge (custom).  
Can anyone help me identify?

Thx!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [top\_notch\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015907/http:/typophile.com/files/top_notch_logo_0.jpg) | 47.12 KB |
author: ReneRutten

comments.content: What do you like about this design? The chubby feeling, like [Los Feliz](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015907/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/emigre/los_feliz_bold_italic/)? The swashiness, like [ITC Bookman Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015907/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_bookman_std_bold_italic/?s=c) (click the characters in the overview to see the swash variants)? Just to know in what direction we need to look.

Thanks!

I'm making a logo for a brasserie/restaurant. It has to be classy, but also modern. So I'm looking for a modern swashed font, preferably a serif font. Not to curly. ITC Bookman comes really near. Love the Nespresso logo by the way. Looking for that kind of look and feel.

How about something like Underware's [Auto 3 Black Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015907/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/underware/auto-3/black-italic/)?

- Mike Yanega

Thanks everyone, you've really helped me out.

René
